name: Jake Firewall
description:
How to play

Move: Arrow keys or WASD
Punch: CTRL 
Dash: Alt

Kick ass and save the day.

---

The year is 2182.

Megacorps control every aspect of human life, dictating how they spend their money, what to think and who to talk to.

Under the rule of the dominating Algorithm, humanity has become unable to resist the manipulation of these corporations, leaving the world filled with mindless drones.

But all is not lost, there is a small resistance fighting for control of personal data everywhere.

The leader of that resistance is humanity’s last hope...

That man is Jake “Firewall” Jackson!

A word from Jake

"Yo gronkers - Jake here with some great tips to help ya keep your identity where it belongs!

  • "Limit the personal information you share on social media. Keep it need to know."
  • "Browse in incognito or private mode, them browsers have eyes, grinder"
  • "Use a search engine that keeps ya secrets safe, like DuckDuckGo"
  • "Keep their eyes covered when you surf, use a virtual private network (VPN)"
  • "Careful where you click, gronk, don't get phished!"
  • "Download an antivirus with anti-malware support to your uplink"
  • "Don't forget your mobile device, stay safe on the go, grinder"
  • "Don't be a slug. Never login to sensistive accounts like online banking on a public computer"

Stay safe out there grinders and fight the megacorps!

- Jake "Firewall" Jackson"

---

Made in 2 very frantic days for the IGA Impact Jam 2022.

Coding and game design: Steve de Niese, Alex Byatt
Art: Alex Byatt
